title: Boku to Oresama
sinopse:
1. Boku to Oresama (Me and Incredible You)
2. Yume Miru Koro wo Tou ni Sugitemo (Even Though the Time When I Dreamed is Long Past)
3. Ano Hi ni Kaeranai (I'm Not Going Back To That Day)
4. Bus Stop
5. Rebirth
6. Ano, Natsu no Hi (That Day, A Summer Day)
7. Aa! Bokura Kitakou Ouendan (Oh! We Are the North High Cheering Party)
